column5: great report, thanks for sharing.

Hey steve nice fish! where did you get those if you dont mind me asking? I also go to fleming and am a 2nd yr F&W student. We`ve been hitting the eastern tribs with great success but I want to try somewhere new. Also people tend to get mad a gill hold shots so you might just  wanna let your buddy know before taking a pic next time. Great report and good luck!

if ppl read our other posts, they would see that we very rarely gill hold fish, so flame all u want, im not worried about it.  They are held by the gill plate, not the gill rakers, the fish will be fine.
Awesome Steve, nicely done!

Well, its about time, I finally got out for some chrome !!!  Water had some tinge, but still good vis.  Chromers were eating up the roe bags, all dime sized, colour didnt matter.                    Hope u enjoyed
Nice pics.. Looks like you boys had quite the day out there..
Excellent fish and pics!!!
Nice fish Steve. My boy was out today,landed 1 nice eater for his efforts.
Wow...great job!  Every trib I checked today was frozen solid...LOL
Absolutely wonderful pictures!... Nature and Fishing at its finest..  Thank you for sharing!..  Man those pics are crisp and clear.. awesome once again!
nice fish great pictures  rob
Thanks for the pics, hopefully next time youll learn how to hold fish.
where's your reports bud ??
I dont fish much anymore
well our apologies for the gill hold then sir.  if you had read my previous reports, you'd realize thats not even me
Beautiful fish and pics.  Thanks for sharing what looked like a fantastic day's fishing.  007

I amazed you even found some open water.  The past couple of days the ice on the trib I frequent has been so thick I had a tough time breaking through it.  I could see them through the ice but that was about it.  Nice fish by the way.  I look forward to some rain or warmer weather to clear away some of that ice.
Nice fall steel for sure !!!!.  ..great pics as well...
There is a market for pictures like those, just beautiful.  Composition, balance, exposure, they're all there.  Wrap 1000 words of text around those shots, you gots yerslef a treat.  Good luck!
great report and awesome pics,congrats on the fish
NICE.  I went out today for steel, got to the trib at sun up to find.....3 inches of solid ice.
Some really nice CHROME way to go!
NICE WORK GUYZ GOTTA LOVE SNOW CONS!! EVEN IF THERES NO FISH IT JUST LOOKS NICE  LOL
Really impressive fish there, Steve. The colours are super too! Congrats!
nice job Steve, thanks for the report
thanks for the positive comments guys
Great report and pics.  Those fish are mint.  If only I had enough $ to pay for gas...
yeah gas can get expensive for those steelies, thats for sure
Nice work,...great report,..you really should tell your buddy though unless he is keeping those fish to stay away from the gills while holding them.  Cheers!!!
